Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The trust is believed to be the first in the UK to prioritise BAME staff in this way
Black, Asian and minority ethnic (BAME) staff who may need face masks or tests for Covid-19 are being prioritised by an NHS trust.… [+1490 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus in Norfolk UK: Norwich woman with incurable cancer joins lockdown Race for Life | Latest Norfolk and Suffolk News - Eastern Daily Press
articles.description: A 32-year-old woman living with incurable cancer is hoping to inspire people to keep up the fight against the disease during the coronavirus pandemic by taking part in Race for Life at home.
articles.content:
PUBLISHED: 12:59 28 April 2020 | UPDATED: 14:36 28 April 2020

articles.title: 'Complacency is our biggest enemy,' warns Robin Swann, as 20 further Covid-19 deaths confirmed in Northern Ireland - Belfast Telegraph
articles.description: Health Minister Robin Swann has warned "complacency is our biggest enemy", after Northern Ireland recorded its biggest single-day increase in Covid-19 deaths since the outbreak began.
articles.content:
Health Minister Robin Swann has warned "complacency is our biggest enemy", after Northern Ireland recorded its biggest single-day increase in Covid-19 deaths since the outbreak began.
